name: ugs-zip-upload-function
description: Cloud Function to generate signed URLs for UGS dataset uploads to GCS

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy ugs-zip-upload --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --region us-central1 --memory 256MB --timeout 60s --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-with-auth: gcloud functions deploy ugs-zip-upload --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --region us-central1 --memory 256MB --timeout 60s
